title: All Who Are Bold and Young of Heart Should Take Up Book...
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Circular, with shaped edge; in the center a book, hammer, and sickle, surrounded by a vine border; around the outer rim the inscription, in Russian, "All who are bold and young of heart should take up book, hammer, and sickle"
name: Plate
